original_text: Hello, I'm saying words to the microphone. My name is John Mathis with no H and two T's in Mathis. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9. And I have a cat named Pooh and another one named Ollie. And dogs are good and horses are tall. Thank you for listening. Thank you for coming to this wonderful day. And I hope that everything will be good in the future too. Cthulhu, dinosaur, vibrant, hexagon, sparkling water, juggling balls. Thank you.

english.translated_text: Hello, I'm saying words to the microphone. My name is John Mathis with no H and two T's in Mathis. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9. And I have a cat named Pooh and another one named Ollie. And dogs are good and horses are tall. Thank you for listening. Thank you for coming to this wonderful day. And I hope that everything will be good in the future too. Cthulhu, dinosaur, vibrant, hexagon, sparkling water, juggling balls. Thank you.
english.romanization_method: NONE - Do not apply any romanization method. Retain the original script.

spanish.translated_text: Hola, estoy diciendo palabras al micrófono. Mi nombre es John Mathis sin H y con dos T's en Mathis. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9. Y tengo un gato llamado Pooh y otro llamado Ollie. Y los perros son buenos y los caballos son altos. Gracias por escuchar. Gracias por venir a este maravilloso día. Y espero que todo esté bien en el futuro también. Cthulhu, dinosaurio, vibrante, hexágono, agua con gas, pelotas malabaristas. Gracias.
spanish.romanization_method: NONE - Do not apply any romanization method. Retain the original script.

chinese.translated_text: 你好，我正在对着麦克风说话。我的名字是约翰·马西斯，没有H，Mathis有两个T。1，2，3，4，5，6，7，8，9。我有一只叫普的猫，另一只叫奥利。狗是好的，马很高。谢谢你们的倾听。感谢你们来到这个美好的一天。我希望未来一切都会好。克苏鲁，恐龙，生机勃勃，六边形，气泡水，杂耍球。谢谢。
chinese.romanization_method: PINYIN - Convert the text from Simplified Chinese to Pinyin, including tone markers. Maintain accuracy in reflecting the original Mandarin pronunciation.
chinese.romanized_text: Nǐ hǎo, wǒ zhèngzài duìzhe màikèfēng shuōhuà. Wǒ de míngzì shì Yuēhàn·Mǎxīsī, méiyǒu H, Mathis yǒu liǎng gè T. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9. Wǒ yǒuyī zhī jiào pǔ de māo, lìng yī zhī jiào àolì. Gǒu shì hǎo de, mǎ hěn gāo. Xièxiè nǐmen de qīngtīng. Gǎnxiè nǐmen láidào zhège měihǎo de yītiān. Wǒ xīwàng wèilái yīqiè dōu huì hǎo. Kè sū lǔ, kǒnglóng, shēngjī bóbó, liùbiānxíng, qìpào shuǐ, záshuǎ qiú. Xièxiè.

arabic.translated_text: مرحبا، أقول كلمات للميكروفون. اسمي جون ماثيس بلا حرف H وبه حرفان T في ماثيس. 1، 2، 3، 4، 5، 6، 7، 8، 9. ولدي قطة اسمها بوه وواحدة أخرى اسمها أولي. والكلاب جيدة والخيول طويلة. شكراً للاستماع. شكراً للحضور في هذا اليوم الرائع. وآمل أن تكون كل الأمور جيدة في المستقبل أيضاً. كذل، دinosaur، نابض بالحياة، سداسي، ماء فوار، كرات تتلاعب. شكراً.
arabic.romanization_method: ALA-LC -  Use the American Library Association — Library of Congress (ALA-LC) romanization system for Arabic. Utilize full UTF-8 characters for diacritics and special characters to ensure precise representation. Adhere to standardized conventions for transliterating non-Latin scripts.
arabic.romanized_text: Marhaban, aqūlu kalimāt lil-mīkrofon. Ismī Jun Māthīs bilā ḥarf H w bihi ḥarfān T fī Māthīs. 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9. Waladī qiṭṭa ismuhā Būh wa wāḥida ukhraw ismuhā ʾAwlī. Wal-kilāb jayyidīn wal-khayūl ṭawīla. Shukran lil-istimāʿ. Shukran lil-ḥuḍūr fī hādhā al-yawm al-rāʾiʿ. Wa ʾāmulu an takūn kull al-umur jayyida fī al-mustaqbal aydan. Kaṯhūlū, dīnāṣūr, nābiḍ bil-ḥayāh, saddāsī, māʾ fawwār, kurāt tataʿalab. Shukran.

segments.original_segment_text: Thank you for listening. Thank you for coming to this wonderful day.

english.translated_text: Thank you for listening. Thank you for coming to this wonderful day.
english.romanization_method: NONE - Do not apply any romanization method. Retain the original script.

spanish.translated_text: Gracias por escuchar. Gracias por venir a este maravilloso día.
spanish.romanization_method: NONE - Do not apply any romanization method. Retain the original script.

segments.original_segment_text: Cthulhu, dinosaur, vibrant, hexagon, sparkling water, juggling balls.

english.translated_text: Cthulhu, dinosaur, vibrant, hexagon, sparkling water, juggling balls.
english.romanization_method: NONE - Do not apply any romanization method. Retain the original script.

spanish.translated_text: Cthulhu, dinosaurio, vibrante, hexágono, agua con gas, pelotas malabaristas.
spanish.romanization_method: NONE - Do not apply any romanization method. Retain the original script.

chinese.translated_text: 克苏鲁，恐龙，生机勃勃，六边形，气泡水，杂耍球。
chinese.romanization_method: PINYIN - Convert the text from Simplified Chinese to Pinyin, including tone markers. Maintain accuracy in reflecting the original Mandarin pronunciation.
chinese.romanized_text: Kè sū lǔ, kǒnglóng, shēngjī bóbó, liùbiānxíng, qìpào shuǐ, záshuǎ qiú.

arabic.translated_text: كذل، د dinosaur، نابض بالحياة، سداسي، ماء فوار، كرات تتلاعب.
arabic.romanization_method: ALA-LC -  Use the American Library Association — Library of Congress (ALA-LC) romanization system for Arabic. Utilize full UTF-8 characters for diacritics and special characters to ensure precise representation. Adhere to standardized conventions for transliterating non-Latin scripts.
arabic.romanized_text: Kaṯhūlū, dīnāṣūr, nābiḍ bil-ḥayāh, saddāsī, māʾ fawwār, kurāt tataʿalab.
